ComicInfo.Title: One Summer's Day in the Big City; Cracked Survival Primer; Torture in Baseball Terms; One the Beach the Day After with Dr. Strangelove or How I Learned to Live with and Love Roaches; Monsters Get Off on Ecological Disasters!; Bomb Shelters of the Rich & Famous!; The Amazing Prophecies of Nostroodamus; Travel Ads Before and After; One Fine Day Down at the Farm; Form & Function Looks at the Roach!; Goon with the Wind: 1990; Reason for Living; Final Episodes of Fantasy Shows; The Coming Environmental Crisis!; One Bright and Sunny Day
